title: Fourth Annual Plan ₿ Forum Concludes in Lugano with Record Attendance and New Milestones for Bitcoin Adoption
content: Plan ₿, an initiative founded in collaboration with Tether and the City of Lugano to promote the use of Bitcoin and blockchain technology, proudly concluded the fourth annual Plan ₿ Forum this weekend. The two-day event, held on October 24-25, drew more than 4,000 participants from across 64 countries, a 140% […]
